mapper.insert: insert into db_publishpicture (SEQUENCEID, PRODUCTID, 'ATTRIBUTE', PLATFORMID, PLATFORMNAME, FLAG, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPTYPENAME, CORPID, OPERNFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, ATTRIBUTEID, USEING, OPENFLAG, PICTUREURL ) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoptypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoptypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opernflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{attributeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pictureurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update db_publishpicture set PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'ATTRIBUTE' = #{attribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLATFORMID = #{platformid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLATFORMNAME = #{platformname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOPTYPEID = #{shoptypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOPTYPENAME = #{shoptypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERNFLAG = #{opernflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATEOPER = #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ATTRIBUTEID = #{attributeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USEING = #{useing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PICTUREURL = #{pictureurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, PRODUCTID, 'ATTRIBUTE', PLATFORMID, PLATFORMNAME, FLAG, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPTYPENAME, CORPID, OPERNFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, ATTRIBUTEID, USEING, OPENFLAG, PICTUREURL from db_publishpicture where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, PRODUCTID, 'ATTRIBUTE', PLATFORMID, PLATFORMNAME, FLAG, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPTYPENAME, CORPID, OPERNFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, ATTRIBUTEID, USEING, OPENFLAG, PICTUREURL from db_publishpicture
